Yes, there are several highly regarded Welsh language schools in Cardiff. These include:

1. Ysgol Glantaf
2. Ysgol Gyfun Gymraeg Glantaf
3. Ysgol Gyfun Gymraeg Bro Edern
4. Ysgol Gyfun Cwm Rhymni
5. Ysgol Gyfun Gymraeg Plasmawr
6. Ysgol Gyfun Gymraeg Bro Morgannwg
7. Ysgol Gyfun Gymraeg Aberaeron

These schools provide an immersive environment for students to learn the Welsh language, history, and culture, and are highly regarded by the local community. They offer a range of extracurricular activities, cultural events, and opportunities to participate in Welsh language competitions, such as the Urdd Eisteddfod. They are also known for their academic excellence and high-quality teaching, ensuring that students receive a world-class education while becoming fluent Welsh speakers.
